snippet: More than 300,000 young illegal immigrants have applied for the Obama administration’s new immigration program since August, the Department of Homeland Security said Friday.
abstract: Department of Homeland Security says that more than 300,000 young illegal immigrants have applied for Obama administration's program that gives temporary reprieves from deportation and over 50,000 have received deferrals.
lead_paragraph: More than 300,000 young illegal immigrants have applied for the Obama administration’s new immigration program since August, the Department of Homeland Security said Friday.

headline.seo: Obama Immigration Program Sees Rapid Rise in Applications
headline.main: More Young Illegal Immigrants Apply for, and Receive, Reprieves
headline.print_headline: More Young Illegal Immigrants Apply for, and Receive, Reprieves
